game_description: A game inspired by gorilla tag!
review_1: Now I’m not just saying this because I’m mod but the community is great and more than ever DONT ASK FOR MOD also join the games discord and be the nicest most funny and best monkey and SCRUNCH will make more updates slowly but they will be vital for the game so join the community today
review_2: wow! amazing game and good music. even though its a WIP its really done well for a couple of days in development. a few suggestions are make tunnels to maps so you cant see or get out of the map also make a way to tag and if you need help with any scripts or help developing I can help. lastly I would love to join your discord if you have one!

review_5: This game is very good and has a lot to offer for a game that's new it has mod vents, shop, forest and cartoon world. The game is also getting horror and it has a actual body with arms, it has good physics and actually runs like gtag. There are some glitches put they might all be patched soon
